SamPy.focus.FocusPlots.FocusTrend¶

SamPy.focus.FocusPlots.FocusTrend(xmin, xmax, title, type, input_folder, output_folder, output='FocusTrend')¶

Plots Focus trend since given minimum J-L date (mxin). xmax is used to limit the fit.
